plugin fetch

Usage Synopsis
By name $ appbuilder plugin fetch <Name>
By ID $ appbuilder plugin fetch <ID>
By path $ appbuilder plugin fetch <Path>
By URL $ appbuilder plugin fetch <URL>
By keyword(s) $ appbuilder plugin fetch [<Keyword> [<Keyword>]*>]

Imports the selected Apache Cordova plugin or custom npm or NativeScript module into your project. You can specify an Apache Cordova plugin by local path; URL to a GitHub repository; name, ID or keyword of a plugin published in the Apache Cordova Plugin Registry or the npm registry. You can specify a custom npm or NativeScript module by local path; URL to a GitHub repository; name, ID or keyword of a module published in the npm registry.

For Apache Cordova plugins, this operation copies the Apache Cordova plugin files to the plugins directory.
For NativeScript projects, this operation copies the module files to the plugins directory and adds the module as a dependency in the package.json file of your project.

Command Limitations

  • You can fetch only Plugman-compatible Apache Cordova plugins.
  • You can fetch only custom NativeScript modules which are valid npm packages.

Related Commands

Command Description
kendoui Lists the available Kendo UI Core or Kendo UI Professional packages that you can add to your project.
kendoui install Updates or adds Kendo UI Code or Kendo UI Professional to your project.
kendoui notes Shows release notes for the available Kendo UI Core and Kendo UI Professional packages.
plugin Lists all Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules that are currently enabled for your project.
plugin add Enables Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules for your project.
plugin configure Configures plugin variables for selected core, integrated or verified Apache Cordova plugins.
plugin remove Disables Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules from your project.
plugin find Searches by one or more keywords for Apache Cordova plugins or custom npm or NativeScript modules.
